review: Under Dr. Rashmi's expert guidance, I successfully lowered my HbA1c from [previous level] to [current level]. Her personalized treatment plan, including medication, diet, and exercise, along with her dedicated monitoring, has been instrumental in my progress.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Rashmi's clinic has good hygiene standards. Also Dr. rashmi was very polite with the patient and tried understanding all pain points, history, current eating/sleeping habits and then suggested way forward accordingly. Have been following her remedies since a week, have seen very positive outcomes. 

Would definitely vouch for her for any patient looking for their diabetic reversal journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Dr rashmi is the most welcoming and friendly doctor i have ever met, she explained the health condition very well and how the treatment process is, she made me understand the importance of a healthy lifestyle in the reversal of diabetes and its management, this help me build a better routine and believe in myself, the staff was also very welcoming and helped clarify any doubts i had, ambience was nice, my hba1c dropped from 8 to 6 in 3 months under the guidance of the doctor and the health care staffs, i feel much more energetic and fit, looking forward to complete reversal in the future, would definetely recommend if anyone is looking for diabetes reversal and help in building a healthy lifestyle.
reply_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Thank you Dr. RASHMI. 
Such wonderful experience every time I visit. She gives such a wonderful explanation for everything and makes me understand why and how I need to do certain things to manage my health.
I love how she catches hold of every small detail or problem I share with her, and gives good solution for the same. Thank you.
reply_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I took treatment from dr Rashmi, she is very polite and friendly. I was very tensed as I recently got diagnosed with diabetes and didn't have much knowledge about it. I tried many things but my hba1c was not coming down. Then I took help from her, 3 months back my hba1c was 11 and now it's 6.5 and m not on any medication. I am very happy with the services and staff is also very polite with neat and clean area.
reply_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Rashmi G R was friendly, co-operative, understood my concerns and guided me well with my health concerns. She clarified my doubts in a professional yet simple way. The staff here was welcoming, good space and well equipped clinic.
My HbA1c was 7.9 when I visited her, currently it is down to 5.9. All thanks to her guidance. Highly recommend.
reply_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your valuable feedback.

review: I registered Sugarfit reversal program for my mom. Her hba1c was 9.8% when she started her journey with Sugarfit. She had a wonderful experience with Dr Rashmi who is really an excellent person, has lot of medical abilities and helped my mom in reducing her medicines which she was using for the past 12 years. Without Dr Rashmi and her coach Nilufur it wouldn't be possible for my mom to reduce her hba1c to 5.7% now . Excellent and commendable support from all the team members, staff i must not forget to thank their for hospitality and  how they greet their patients at the clinic. It's very clean and neat atmosphere. The diabetes therapy was a great experience to be true. Overall I am very grateful and thankful to Dr Rashmi and the entire team of Sugarfit family. I highly recommend Sugarfit to my family relatives and my friends. Thanks Sugarfit for helping my mom reverse her diabetes so easily üôèüôèüôè

review: When we went to her, my uncle was diagnosed with diabetes for the first time, and his hba1c level had increased to 10.5%. We were terrified, but she made us feel at ease and guided us through necessary lifestyle changes that resulted in fantastic results. We felt energized, and his HbA1c dropped to 6%. He is currently not taking any medications, and this is the best gift any healthcare professional can give to his or her patient.
